Name: Platform Challenge
About the game: Do you can Overcome your limits and beat the Platform Challenge? Guide your way through different challenges and reach incredible achievements. Platform Challenge was made with the aim of being a challenging game, for the beginners and also the advanced players . Incredible obstacles like moving floors, giant blades, fireballs and deadly rays await you in Platform Challenge. Be the first among your friends to beat them. Platform Challenge was made to challenge even the most experienced players. The game contains 4 different levels of difficulty , totaling 160 challenging stages to overcome. Soundtrack and totally unique effects guarantee a greater immersion. If you have problems using the XBox 360 controller, just launch the game trough steam’s Big Picture mode and set the control options to “ Generic Gamepad”.
Meta Title: Platform Challenge: Apr 20, 2018, YOS and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Platform Challenge? Check out the release date (Apr 20, 2018), developer insights from YOS, and a complete game summary.
